column5: Hey guys,  Can anyone recommend a cottage rental place 3-4 hours north of Toronto that has good fishing and is relatively cheap.  I know that's pretty vague, but if anyone has any place they've been and would recommend, please let me know. Thanks
Are you looking for a fishing cottage with "the boys" or a family atmosphere with a sandy beach and playground? This should be your first stop... http://www.ontariofishingnetwork.com/

Stayed here a few years back.  Good fishing and cottages.  It is under new ownership since I was there.  It was "reasonable" for a friend and I, but not sure what the rates are now.  http://www.ontariolodges.com/opeecheelakelodge.htm
Fishing with the "boys" obviously...is there any other way?
Check out Roys link they are alot of  great lodges that advertise on OFC because of the quality of the places and the dedication to the fisherman we have found them to be the best.   Art
Lakair Lodge on the west arm of Lake Nippissing is a popular spot around here.  The pike fishing is stupid at times there, just ask the BigFish.
